website_summaries.verdict: Those wanting a traditional wine glass style for an affordable price will find their match in this quality set.
pros: Increased thickness makes glasses extremely sturdy
Can be safely used for drinks other than wine
Buyers are impressed with the longer stem
cons: Some owners claim the glasses feel too cheap for their price

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.  They are crystal clear!
customer_reviews.text: These unbreakable wine glass have lived up to their expectations. I used them last night for my dinner party and husband was amazed that they look like glasses but are super light weight! This pic was taken after they were used and subsequently hand washed and dried. No water stains and they are crystal clear!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The glasses wobble and shake Used them once and washed them once and the stem ends look like they are melting After submitting this the company took care of the problem with in a day. The customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: michele d

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The glasses melted in the top row of the dishwasher. I called to return them and get replacement ones. They promised to replace the ones that melted but never followed through with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Brensilber

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Are perfect for people who have kiddos that when washing dishes tend to be hard on glass- they have broken all my wine glasses when washing so this was a perfect alternative. Only complaint is that the do scratch easy mine have scratches from when washing the kids use the green rough scrubbing side of the scrub pad not the sponge ( yes I told them not to ;( ) obviously I can’t have nice things until they are out of the house so these still work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MICHLEY understands how to give the best customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Wrong order delivered. Wrong description on the wrong box. They are very small glasses but it says 12.5 ozs I can’t get anyone to talk to me at Amazon I just want the correct order. The four glasses that I received out of the eight very nice. I want my other four UPDATE. i contacted MICHLEY direct and got the BEST service. They told me to keep the small glasses (wrong order) and they would immediately send me the correct order. So said so done! I have the 8 beautiful 12.5 oz glasses now and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, shatterproof, wine glass
customer_reviews.text: We got these to use in our hot tub and outside. I haven't tested their 'breakability' yet, but they seem very sturdy. We didn't want to have to worry about having glass break outside. You can get a set of (2) or a set of (4) and the price seemed pretty good. Hope this review was helpful, let me know if you have any questions!
customer_reviews.author: The Fair Critic

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced and not worth the investment. They do not wash well, cloudy after a few uses. I would not recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Marfil

customer_reviews.title: UNBREAKABLE STEMWARE
customer_reviews.text: They are called red wine glasses, but are really white wine glasses. You can tell by the pictures. I ordered them planning to use them for white so no disappointment. Lots of people would be satisfied using them for red, and they work just fine. I prefer a larger diameter for red wine and are available if you search. Great for patio, pool, boating, travel, and fancy camping.
customer_reviews.author: Pashado

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & durable solution for outdoor dining!
customer_reviews.text: If you didn’t know these wine glasses were plastic, you’d swear they were glass!!!! I was so pleased with the look and durability of these glasses! We were always weary of using glass wine glasses by the pool, but now have no worries, as these glasses look beautiful & are completely worry free for all of our pool parties. Couldn’t be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Raczko

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of ordering 6 of these glasses @ $9 each. They are simply cheap, cheap, cheap! & not worth the money. The drinking edge of each glass is very sharp & you can actually cut your lip on it. They are so light, that they are easy to knock over even while filling with wine. I would not recommend this product to anyone, especially at this ridiculous price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look Great, very tough!
customer_reviews.text: Its very hard to tell that these things aren't glass. They look very real and I actually did squeeze and try to break them.. couldn't do it. Great for a beach party or other public event. They survived a night in my backpack and a party that night and still look great. For an outside patio where you're concerned about broken glass these could be a great idea
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Read fine print
customer_reviews.text: Are they unbreakable ? Yes. But my stupid ass didn’t read into it & notice they’re plastic. Is that the sellers fault ? No, just don’t drunk buy these like I did thinking they’ll be nice wine set you can bring out for dinner guests. I found 3 cheaper WAY NICER sets at TJ max for literally a quarter of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expectedd
customer_reviews.text: We have a couple "pair" of outdoor glasses. I liked the idea of a full set. They are okay and as described, but I was surprised at their size. The glasses are smaller than appear in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Cory C

customer_reviews.title: They look like glass!
customer_reviews.text: We had a set to acrylic wine glasses before and they got scratched and dulled quickly even though we treated them so carefully. Now no one can tell by looking that we're sipping from plastic. That said they are plastic. They feel like plastic (nice plastic!) on your lips and it does affect the taste of wine. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Heher

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outdoor Use and Traveling
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have noted, these glasses are very light. I would highly recommend not filling them not more than halfway, as they would be top-heavy and more easily tipped over. That being said, I bought these for outdoor use on our backyard patio. I don't want to risk breaking our Riedel glasses out there. Also, we bring them to the park for 4th of July celebrations to share a bottle of wine with friends. My glasses arrived in perfect shape and work great--just be mindful of their lightness, as they aren't as stable as regular glass or crystal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor and a bit more elegant than plastic party cups
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product for outdoor uses. Enjoying wine on the patio is a little less hazardous in terms of not worrying about glass breakage. The glasses look nicer than the garden variety colorful “sippy cups” out there. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cassdarce

customer_reviews.title: These wine glasses are seriously a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money! They look like real glass but they are a really thick and sturdy plastic! I bought them to use at my baby shower so I didn't have to bring any glass and they look beautiful! I'm so impressed that I have to buy a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Renshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great non-breakable wine glasses!
customer_reviews.text: The best wine glasses that are not glass! They look like a real wine glass and the price is affordable! I purchased a set of two to be sure we liked them. We took them to the cottage and sat on the dock and didn't have to worry about breaking glass! Liked them so much we ordered another set of four!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily, flimsy feeling and flexible, unattractive seam on side.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but kind of disappointed. I bought these because my girlfriend has a phobia of glass shattering in her hand after some bad experiences, but loves wine. Even without picking them up, you can tell they’re not glass. The seam down the side makes them look cheap at the least, and when you pick them up the plastic is so thin it’s flexible. The dealbreaker though was that there was a sticker attached to one cup when it arrived, and by the time I had finished scrubbing it off (just hot water and a normal kitchen sponge) the ‘glass’ was totally scratched and cloudy. My dollar store plastic holds up better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas Lapham

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, I guess
customer_reviews.text: If you’re expecting a cheap plastic cup shaped like a wine glass, you’ll probably be fine with these. They look & feel nothing like glass at all & there are obvious seams on the sides. As soon as I got them I washed them with a kitchen sponge before using them & it scratched them & left permanent lines all over which is frustrating. I guess they will be fine to use home alone or outdoors, but definitely don’t expect anyone to think they’re real glass!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Very good for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style but thought the glass would be a little heavier. With the manufactures warning I am a little leery of putting them in the dishwasher. I noticed a thin vertical seam along the center of the glass running from the top all the way down and including the base.. I sure would like to see how these glasses are produced.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Good so Far
customer_reviews.text: They are a little smaller than expected, but durable and hopefully hold up to the dishwasher better than my previous ones from the dollar store. I think they will, I recommend them, just know they are slightly smaller than you might expect.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Got so many compliments on these. We had a big outdoor event and I didn’t want to take out my nice glasses and opted for these instead of those awful disposable ones. Someone said these are the nicest plastic glasses I have ever seen. It was very funny.
customer_reviews.author: stinkster

customer_reviews.title: Buying these got me a new job....emptying the dish washer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife because she's broken every nice wine glass we had. She failed to see the value and instead volunteered me for dish washing duty, then I volunteered her for AA. I'm currently in the witness protection program and only commenting here to save the lives of other husbands.
customer_reviews.author: No Shame In My Game

customer_reviews.title: An elegant shape but inferior material
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because they looked like wine glasses. I was very disappointed when they arrived. The seam was obvious even with the optical distortion of the bowl. My eyes wanted to cross every time I looked at them. Furthermore, when I put one down on the counter holding the stem near the base, the bowl was quivering on the stem. These are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Classy and practical!
customer_reviews.text: My friends thought they were glass and were amazed when they realized I was drinking out of a very nice looking plastic wine "glass."They are so well balanced. They don't keel over and break when set on the table too forcefully or are knocked over. I was constantly replacing my glass and crystal ware until lately! Lately we are rv ing and these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: P. Delaney-Manabe

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for your wine
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a while, and stop using it after my husband complained several times. I gave it 4 stars beacuse it is as described, but we really don’t like it. The material and light weight made it feels like toys...while as this price, I can’t expect more.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of breaking wine glasses so I decided to give these a try. They look like glass from a distance, but are obviously plastic up close. I like them because they are unbreakable. We did thrown them to the ground to test them and they did not break.
customer_reviews.author: Solstice

customer_reviews.title: RV Approved
customer_reviews.text: We needed a non breakable wine glass for our RV, don’t like to drink wine out of a solo cup. I feel the glass adds glam to our camping. Nice having 4 to share a glass of wine with fellow campers.
customer_reviews.author: janice poolson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Wine glasses!!!
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses are great! I really love them because they feel and look like actual glass, They also kept my beverage cold longer than an actual wine glass. I love the that they are dishwasher safe as well. These are also great if you have very active kids or if you're just clumsy like me because they're unbreakable as well, I'd totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymoon

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like about ABS Free Plastics!?
customer_reviews.text: Well, you aren't going to brake these, and they are dishwasher safe, so much so I've put them through on the top, bottom and all around and they haven't even flinched. They washed well, and are a blast with the kids and their Apple Juice, now they say they wanna get lit like daddy!
customer_reviews.author: NegroISO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect poolside wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! I'm somewhat a wine glass snob, thin glass, right shape etc. but can just imagine one of those tumbling to the concrete and/or pool so had to figure out something. I can't drink wine in a solo cup or some chunky plastic glass. These are absolutely perfect! They look and feel like the real thing only much lighter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bride

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor use!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great to use for outdoor events where you are drinking wine. They are very durable, clean easily, and look just like an actual glass wine glass. Another great thing about these glasses is that they are easy to clean - just throw them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight  plastic  wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy plastic wine glasses. My neighbor thought they were glass! We use these in our spa. They hold a lot of wine. The stem is a little longer than I wanted, i have to be careful when i place it on the table beside the spa.
customer_reviews.author: RunBike

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great -- They feature attractive design, large capacity and sturdy construction. While it is immediately apparent (at least to me) that these glasses are made of plastic, not glass, the fact that they are unbreakable makes them a perfect choice for patio, poolside or picnic use.
customer_reviews.author: VY

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the pranks alone
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use outside near the pool and they are perfect for that. Although lighter in weight, they look just like normal wine glasses from afar. I never miss an opportunity, when asking a friend from across the room, whether he or she would like a glass of wine, to casually toss the wine glass to them as I ask and watch them panic as it soars through the air. Pro tip- throw it just out of reach to ensure added alarm.
customer_reviews.author: DPSeeck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These shatter proof glasses are amazing! They look like real glasseware and i don’t have to worry about my son grabbing them and hurting himself with it.
customer_reviews.author: funmiford

customer_reviews.title: Looks like glass with the sturdiness of plastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father, and he was so impressed them. He resisted plastic glasses for a while because he thought that plastic glasses looked cheap. He loved that when he offered someone a glass of wine that these looked "like real wine glasses".
customer_reviews.author: liz linhardt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wine glass
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought these wine glasses. I’m so clumsy that it’s the perfect glass for me.lol It held up nicely in the dishwasher. Update! It melted in the dishwasher after a few washes. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Keshia L

customer_reviews.title: Durable but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very durable but a bit flimsy. It is extremely light weight but it gets top heavy when filled. I found some similar that were acrylic which would have been better, sturdier. Oh well. These are good for now.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: ... these for a couple days but I am very pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these for a couple days but I am very pleased so far. I take them to the pool and someone always says, "you know you can't have glass at the pool" and I am thrilled to let them tap on them to prove they are plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lough

customer_reviews.title: These are great wine glasses for the spa and bath tub
customer_reviews.text: These are great wine glasses for the spa and bath tub. I like to still feel fancy while being safe. The base of the glass is a little uneven and the glasses are so light-weight that they are a little unstable. I haven't had any issues yet, but I have to be very cautious around them to not knock them over.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Smith

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell their not glass until you touch them.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these unbreakable wine glasses for around the pool and patio. They are thin, clear and look like glass until you touch them. They won't fit in my dishwasher so I have to wash by hand but small price to have outside unbreakable pool glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly if you are looking for something sturdy, and won’t break, this is it! I love this product, because before I’d break alll my wine glasses, but this is easy and can wash
customer_reviews.author: Jillie Irving

customer_reviews.title: Look like glass super cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted , they look like real glass , and very sturdy :) I hand wash them with no issue and look great ! Have used many times to go on our park /beach picnics and have gotten many compliments, will definitely purchase again .
customer_reviews.author: Drey

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable stemware that doesn't look and feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: For stemware made of something besides glass, these look and feel shockingly good. Need unbreakable stemware for a boat or RV or poolside? These are the nicest I've seen so far. By far. They've picked a good material and done an excellent job casting and finishing the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a coming summer picnic. It looks very nice and sturdy. The quality about the plastic looks good and most important thing is that those are dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight set - apparently an quality aberation
customer_reviews.text: I found these glasses are lightweight and insubstantial. I doubt they will survive more than a couple of uses and feel like they will blow over in a light breeze. Follow-up: The seller quickly and courteously contacted me regarding the wine glass set. It appears that my set was an outlier with respect to quality and heft. I was graciously sent a replacement set which is great.
customer_reviews.author: heiferdust

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was glass when I opened the package. My friends thought the same thing. I am impressed with the look and how Well it did in the top rack of the dishwasher. I would buy other products from this company,
customer_reviews.author: Oceandiva

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as heavy and sturdy as they should be
customer_reviews.text: Base of glass should be much thicker and heavier, and the thickness of the glass overall should also be much thicker, especially to handle the weight of the wine. Advertised as crystal and they might be, but they are blot my idea of crystal. I will be returning these. Just not good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Sommers

customer_reviews.title: Step Above Plain Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Little worried about plastic glasses, but these are a big step above plain old plastic. Look like glass but feel like heavy plastic. Not cheap, but who wants inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: DON SILVERMAN

customer_reviews.title: they look horrible. honestly
customer_reviews.text: These are thin squishy plastic, and yes they are breakable. you can see the seam down the side. they wobble when you set them down on a flat surface. they look horrible. honestly, just go to the dollar store if you're worried about ruining your wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: haleybop

customer_reviews.title: The are safe for the dishwasher too.
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses are great! Just looking at them one would never know they aren’t glass. Perfect for Happy Hour on the patio or front porch.
customer_reviews.author: J1006

customer_reviews.title: Durable thick plastic
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and durable plastic wine glasses. The look like glass but are thick plastic. I'm excited to use them poolside in the summer without worrying about them breaking!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Carroll

customer_reviews.title: These glasses do a good job of simulating the appearance of real glass
customer_reviews.text: These glasses do a good job of simulating the appearance of real glass, however, they are too lightweight and the stems are too long. I worry I will knock them over. At least if I do, there won't be broken glass all over the floor like before.
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Light weight and looks like glass
customer_reviews.text: Bought these wine glasses for our river cabin. Love them! Light weight and looks like glass.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Do not put in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Loved them but they melted in my dishwasher. Said they are dishwasher safe but they are not. Hand wash only
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McConnaughhay

customer_reviews.title: Good for clumsy spouses
customer_reviews.text: Plastic glasses, not as heavy as a real glass, but not light and flimsy either. Looks great. Real glass to the left (for comparison) and the product on the right.
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the deck
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, good size, wash well. I'm going to buy 4 more.
customer_reviews.author: Runalongbuddy

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Looks real. Great for tailgating or outdoors. Drawback is windy days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are less than 6.5 inches tall, quite a bit shorter than advertised. I was hoping they would be heavier in my hand, just to get that familiar feel of a wine glass, but this is what I get for dropping all my real ones.
customer_reviews.author: nolefalcon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, they are thick and the right size for white wine. I use them in door as well as outside. Eliminates breaking nice glasses. From afar no one can tell the difference between them and glass unless you pick up.
customer_reviews.author: PAG

customer_reviews.title: They Look OK; Haven't Used Yet
customer_reviews.text: I just received the plastic wine glasses, and they have survived a cleaning in the dishwasher. They look very nice, seem to be durable. Haven't used them yet, so can't make a final evaluation.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for having wine out by the pool
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect! I had a few friends over to sip wine and hang in the hot tub. I didn't want glass out by the pool but I also didn't want anything that appeared cheap. No one realized the glasses were plastic until after we did a toast and the glasses didn't clang. They don't look cheap and they did well in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: As close as you can get to glass without suffering for breaking them
customer_reviews.text: After much looking I finally found these ones. It is as close as you can get to real glass without having to suffer around the pool area. I have received a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: unbalanced
customer_reviews.text: The stems of these glasses should be shorter or the bases should be a wider diameter. As lightweight and unbalanced as they are, the glasses (plastics?) are easily knocked over. But I suppose the great news is even if you tip them over the plastic will not shatter.
customer_reviews.author: Evzone

customer_reviews.title: Great for pools!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my pool! No one can get glass in my pool if I give them plastic! They're always confused with glass as well. Good quality! Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: ... little smaller than I expected but the plastic is great and super convenient
customer_reviews.text: They're a little smaller than I expected but the plastic is great and super convenient. I do not recommend putting these in the dishwasher so that they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses for the pool area
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for friends with a pool & they love them. These are quality high end glasses. I would definitely purchase again and or recommen.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and unbreakable.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to use one our new (to us) sailboat we purchased last spring. These were perfect since I was not wanting to worry about wine glasses breaking. So far so good as far as durability since I have had them several months now.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Susan Saburn

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected but otherwise are great
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Parkhurst

customer_reviews.title: I am grateful
customer_reviews.text: If you're a klutz, like I am AND you have a concrete or tile flooring anywhere you take beverages, then these unbreakable wine glasses are for you. I am not a big wine drinker, but iced tea or ice water works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: DeJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable and classy
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They are very classy and don't give the wine a plastic taste, but they're almost impossible to break.
customer_reviews.author: Immer Essen

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for plastic red wine glasses to take to the beach and I bought these. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Billy M. Richter

customer_reviews.title: Buy these !!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these glasses...they look like glass but don't break...Yahoo !!!
customer_reviews.author: Cookiehood

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. not going to fool anyone into thinking that their glasses, they’re definitely plastic, but still very nice. best option I found.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, wont break!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially for use out on the patio or deck! Great looking glass, easy to clean, but won’t break, if dropped. This comes in handy, In my house.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These look just like the real thing! I can drink my wine in a wine "glass" while sitting next to my pool, as wine should be drank!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Tillman

customer_reviews.title: These are not red wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but --not red wine glasses. (I was pretty sure they weren't from the pic but it was a good deal.)
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: These are so tall that they almost seem like they could just fall over
customer_reviews.text: These are so tall that they almost seem like they could just fall over. They are super lightweight - I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: N Frank

customer_reviews.title: Wino???
customer_reviews.text: Gave them as a gift and she uses them almost daily, apparently she likes them a lot, or is she just a wino and doesn’t care?!? Nah, they’re nice wine glasses!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses. Very clean lines
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. Very clean lines, no visible seams and much thinner rims than others I've tried. I purchased to replace some that I had broken and these should hold up better than the last ones. They are also much clearer, no cloudiness or yellow tint.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Look just like glass
customer_reviews.text: I love these 'glasses' even after some use and going through the dishwasher several times, the plastic still looks amazingly like glass. The children love being able to use their own wine glass for their sparkling cider during our celebrations.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect holiday glasses
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses came in super handy over the holidays. Someone is always breaking a glass when company is over. These were a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, bad product
customer_reviews.text: These are really wobbly. They teeter on any flat surface, and feel top heavy in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plastic wine glass
customer_reviews.text: Going on a short trip with friends and wanted some plastic wine glasses to take with us. These are perfect and exactly what I was looking for. The price was great also.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcgregor

customer_reviews.title: The plastic on these wine glasses is so flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on these wine glasses is so flimsy that they are basically throwaway glasses. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: shopping info acct

customer_reviews.title: We use them at the Pool...
customer_reviews.text: Look like glass after many uses. Great for wine at the swimming pool. Will buy more...!!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael F. Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Picture gave me the impression plastic was thicker, almost a two use glass and very light.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Would have given it 4
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Would have given it 4.5 stars if given the chance on the split. The stem is a little bit larger that I would have expected, and they are a little bit lite in weight, but will work out well pool side.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Look Real
customer_reviews.text: These look like real glass and I don't have to worry about being clumsy and breaking anymore real glass wine glasses!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for lounging around the pool. Perfect size and look and feel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! Use them often as I have a “no glass” policy on my patio. Nice enough for entertaining. Put them in the dishwasher many times and they haven’t warped or cracked.
customer_reviews.author: k.wisner

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and practical.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful acrylic stemware-shaped just like crystal wine glasses, but lightweight and unbreakable. We use them for patio dining. I like that I can hold a few by the stems (empty) in one hand - means less trips up and down the porch stairs to go outside.
customer_reviews.author: kso2011

customer_reviews.title: they do look like glass. The glass does not weigh much
customer_reviews.text: When hand dried, they do look like glass. The glass does not weigh much. Wish the mouth opening of the class was bigger. That is the only thing that is really different from a real wine glass
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: Looked great but but came out of dishwasher all mottled
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is going on with these wineglasses but the first time we put this in the dishwasher it came out all spotted. See pictures. Cannot wash this off not sure what it is...?? UPDATE - Customer Service contacted me and replaced the set. So far no issues, so perhaps first was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Gail S.

customer_reviews.title: Stand tall!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for out by the pool. The steams are a little long, but they will do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses. Would not know they are plastic until ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses. Would not know they are plastic until I lift them.
customer_reviews.author: William S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great plastic glasses
customer_reviews.text: Thick enough not to break without being clunky. A bit tall, so they resemble fancy glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L Maroon

customer_reviews.title: Crooked stems
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets...good thing, as one glass in each set has a crooked stem! They will go to the back of the cupboard, maybe I won't need them too often.
customer_reviews.author: kvm

product_meta.title: MICHLEY Unbreakable Red Wine Glasses, Tritan Plastic Shatterproof Wine Goblets 12.5 oz, Set of 4
feature_bullets: WHAT IS TRITAN PLASTIC?- Looks Like Glass, Made With 100% USA Made Premium Material Tritan Plastic, Which Has Been Used To Make Various Products That You Use Every Day. Products Made From Tritan Plastic Are Impact& Shatter Resistant & Health.Comply With Environmental Requirements, They Are Clear, Feels Like You Are Holding a Real Glass.

IS TRITAN PLASTIC SAFE?- It Has Been Rigorously Tested By Third-Party Labs To Ensure Its Safety. Tritan Plastic Does Not Contain BPS (Bisphenol s) Or Any Other Bisphenols. Be Free Of Any Estrogenic and Androgenic Activity (EA-Free). Combine That With Shatter Resistance, And You Have Got a Sturdy & Durable Wine Glasses That Is Safe Enough To Trust with Your Family and Friends.

TOP RACK DISHWASHER SAFE- We Have Increased The Thickness To Make It More Sturdy and Stable. MICHLEY Glasses Is Much Thicker Than Ever, Although It Has The Looks and Clarity of Glass,Won't Break If Dropped or Throw It Under The Backpack. It will not Warp or Crack in the Dishwasher,Easy To Clean Without Breaking and Top Rack Dishwasher Safe,Preferably With a Non-Heated Cycle (Due To Temperature Fluctuations of Dishwashers In That Cyclewhere, The Hot Water Temperature Can Reach Almost 200 F).

EXCELLENT WINE GIFTS - Perfect For Christmas, Thanksgiving, Valentine's Day, Wedding Gift, Birthday ,Mothers Day , Fathers Day, Him or Her. Perfect For Business, Party, Outdoor Picnics, Camping and Around The Pool, Patio, or Boating.MICHLEY Glasses are Perfectly Designed For Any Drink. Available Red Wine, White Wine, Whiskey, Cocktails, Lemonade, Juice, or Even Dessert. They are Lightweight and Comfortable To Hold Even By Kids.

OUR GUARANTEE- All The Products Packed In a Beautiful and Elegant Gift Box, aim To Provide a Best Customer Service, We Offer a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee For Every Item That Leaves Our Store. If You Aren’t 100% Satisfied With Your Purchase, Just Contact Us and Send The Products Back For a Full Refund.
